title: Baby Carrier (?)
description: very large, brightly colored red, yellow, black and white cross stitch and applique strips; extra long top belt repeats pattern; four lined 8\" x 6\" flaps below belt; three large panels of same pattern on top, edged in yellow and red; hidden under top panel are batik squares on next two panels
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
